entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 3.

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or rain beginning in the morning and ending in the afternoon then 70 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023
